verbs.description: The comedian [V: has] come under fire for using a vulgar term to describe Ivanka Trump .
[ARG1: The comedian] has [V: come] [ARG2: under fire] [ARG3: for using a vulgar term to describe Ivanka Trump] .
[ARG0: The comedian] has come under fire for [V: using] [ARG1: a vulgar term] [ARG2: to describe Ivanka Trump] .
[ARG0: The comedian] has come under fire for using a vulgar term to [V: describe] [ARG1: Ivanka Trump] .
